channel.title: Sal Leone's Podcast
channel.description: Mixed and Compiled by *Sal Leone* New York City ............... deep, chunky, soulful HOUSE ...... connecting the WORLD one track at a time.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Deep, Chunky, Soulful HOUSE ... Connecting the world
channel.itunes:author: Sal Leone
channel.itunes:summary: Mixed and Compiled by *Sal Leone* New York City ............... deep, chunky, soulful HOUSE ...... connecting the WORLD one track at a time.

item.title: Rooftop Sessions Vol.14 (Brooklyn to IBIZA)
item.description: Compiled & Mixed by Sal Leone The sounds of IBIZA, New York Style ---------------------------------- 1)Don't Break My Heart (Evren Ulusoy) 2)Again (Sonatore,Amadeo Afriki Mix) 3)C U Movin (Gene Farris,DJ Dealer Mixes) 4)That Trumpet Track (Roger Sanchez, Sexy Weapons) 5)Pon Farr (Evren Ulusoy) 6)Drop Kick Bass (2's Company, This is F...House) 7)Under Control (Robert Procaccini, Hit The Face) 8)Too Good For Me (Mr. Clean) 9)Jazzy Underwear (Manjane) 10)Carlito (Mark Reeve) 11)Canoa (DJ Gregory,Cregor Salto) 12)Stella In The Starlight (Sleazy McGueen Remix) 13)It Was Acid (Chritian Hornbostel,Alfred Azzetto) 14)Hey Hey (Dennis Ferrer,Tom De Neef Remix) 15)Wonderful (Terry Hunter,Feat.Terisa Griffin) 16)Flex (F.Physical) 17)Week Of May 26th (House Essentials 10)
